function_description: Creating a card in a list
initial_state: User is logged into 4ga Boards and viewing a board with at least one list present.
steps: Locate the list where you want to create a new card.
Click on the '+ Add Card' button at the bottom of the list or click the ellipsis icon at the top-right of the list and select 'Add Card'.
Enter the title of the new card.
Press 'Enter' or click the 'Add Card' button to create the card.
expected_state: A new card with the specified title is created and displayed at the bottom of the selected list.
